name: Super Earth
startIntroPart1: Welcome, Democracy Council, can you lead super earth to prosperity?
declaringWar: You are an afront to Democracy, prepare to be liberated.
attacked: You have made a grave mistake in the eyes of Lady Liberty.
defeated: Democracy never truly dies, we will return.
introduction: Hello fellow Nation, what are you thoughts on freedom?
tradeRequest: This deal will be remembered as a lynchpin of democracy.
uniques: -[10]% Culture cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
